name: Cinnamon And Sugar Massage Candle
description:
Yes, it really is a candle that turns into a luxurious massage lotion! All you need to do is light the candle and let it burn for 10-20 minutes or so, blow it out, pour a little into your hand or dip your fingers into it and then massage on to the lucky recipient's back.

This massage candle is scented with the spicy-sweet Cinnamon & Sugar fragrance.


Soy Wax - This is a special blend that is not only skin safe but also skin softening.

Avocado Oil - This oil is said to be good for dry, dull and dehydrated skin. Avocado oil is very nutritious and deeply penetrating. It also contains essential fatty acids, minerals, protein, vitamins A, B, E, D and beta carotene. It is said to be very helpful to those suffering from eczema or psoriasis and similar skin complaints.

Cocoa Butter - Provides a silky barrier that helps retain needed moisture for healthy skin. Cocoa butter also contains natural antioxidants that help to keep your skin happy and healthy and is an excellent skin softener.

Shea Butter - Is reported to benefit dry, damaged and maturing skin. Shea Butter is also known for its natural healing attributes for damaged skin.

Fragrance - Warm Vanilla Sugar.

Approximately 3 oz of skin loving oil and butters.

If you would like a different scent please let me know and I will be happy to create it for you.

Below is a list of scents available for massage candles, lotions and soaps.

Flower/plant type scents:
Bird of Paradise, Lilac, Green Garden, Lavender, Texas Bluebonnet, Lettuce, Fresh Zucchini Flower, Sweet Pea, Jasmine Dreams, Rosemary EO and Moroccan fig,

Food type scents: 
Coconut, Cranberry Fig, Spearmint, Tropical Vacation, Banana, Sugar Plum Fairy, Lemon, Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough, Kumquat, Warm Vanilla Sugar, Lemon Verbena (Yankee type), Chocolate Espresso, Creamsicle, Almond, Wild Cherry, Moonlight Pomegranate, Dark Rich Chocolate, Pumpkin Spice, Oatmeal Milk and Honey, Strawberry, Orange Spice, Buttercream and Snickerdoodle, Arabian Spice, Cotton Candy, Bubblegum, Apple Cinnamon, Cookies and Cream, Almond Biscotti, Turkish Mocha, Peppermint EO, and Champagne

Other types of scents:
Patchouli Dusk, Nag Champa, Vitality and Vigor, Sea Shore, Obsession (men’s), Relaxing, China Rain, Sea Moss, Musk, Cedar, Dragon’s Blood, Cedar and Saffron, Sensuous Sandalwood. 


Other scents available upon request.

name: Chocolate Body Cream
description:
Decadent is a good word for this body cream. Made with shea butter and cocoa butter it will not only leave your skin silky smooth but will help protect you from winter's harsh dryness.

This is a thick cream so a little goes a long way.

Scented with heavenly chocolate fragrance, yum!.

This body cream can be made with any of my available fragrances. Please see my profile for a list.

Approximately 4 oz.

name: Luxurious Shea Butter Soap - Kiss of Bliss
description:
This luxurious bar of soap is made with cocoa butter & shea butter to leave your skin silky soft. It also contains oils infused with Calendula and Chammomile herbs to soothe. Lavender, Bergamot & Grapefruit essential oils are added to relax and revitalize. This soap smells heavenly and relaxing, luscious lavender is sweetened with a touch of citrus.

Each heavenly bar of soap is at least 4 oz.

name: Edible Massage Candle - Chocolate Truffle
description:
Edible Massage Candle - Chocolate Truffle

Yes, it really is a candle that turns into luxurious, 
EDIBLE, massage lotion! All you do is light the candle and let it burn for 15 minutes or so, blow it out, pour a little into your hand or dip your fingers into it and then massage on to the lucky recipient and enjoy!



Ingredients:

- Soy Wax - This is a special blend that is not only skin safe but also skin softening.

- Avocado Oil - This oil is said to be good for dry, dull and dehydrated skin. Avocado oil is very nutritious and deeply penetrating. It also contains essential fatty acids, minerals, protein, vitamins A, B, E, D and beta carotene. It is said to be very helpful to those suffering from eczema or psoriasis and similar skin complaints.

- Cocoa Butter - Provides a silky barrier that helps retain needed moisture for healthy skin. Cocoa butter also contains natural antioxidants that help to keep your skin happy and healthy and is an excellent skin softener.

- Shea Butter - Is reported to benefit dry, damaged and maturing skin. Shea Butter is also known for its natural healing attributes for damaged skin.

- Extra Virgin Coconut Oil - Excellent anti-oxidant, easily penetrates skin to soothe and soften.

- Flavored with heavenly Chocolate Truffle.
- Sweetened with all natural, low calorie Stevia.


Approximately 3 oz of skin loving oil and butters.
